tool_description: get cars from auctions copart.com and iaai.com
name: API for Copart and IAAI
title: API for Copart and IAAI

api_list.name: Search car by VIN code
api_list.description: get car from copart and iaai by vin code

api_list.name: Get all manufacturers
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://api-for-copart-and-iaai.p.rapidapi.com/manufacturers"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "api-for-copart-and-iaai.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all models for each manufacturer
api_list.code:

api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://api-for-copart-and-iaai.p.rapidapi.com/models/{manufacturer_id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "api-for-copart-and-iaai.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get cars from copart and iaai
api_list.description: this is the main endpoint, use it to get all the cars from copart and iaai

optional_parameters.name: vehicle_type
optional_parameters.description: Vehicle type, automobile = 1, motorcycle = 2, atv = 5, watercraft = 12, jet_sky = 11, boat = 7, trailers = 3, mobile_home = 10, emergency_equipment = 13, industrial_equipment = 9, truck = 4, bus = 8

optional_parameters.name: minutes
optional_parameters.description: this parameter allows you to retrieve only those cars that have been updated in the last few minutes

optional_parameters.name: manufacturer_id
optional_parameters.description: Manufacturer id, to get it use /manufacturers endpoint

optional_parameters.name: model_id
optional_parameters.description: Car model id, to get it use /models endpoint

optional_parameters.name: per_page
optional_parameters.description: how many cars show per page

optional_parameters.name: generation_id
optional_parameters.description: Car generation id, to get it use /generations endpoint

api_list.name: Get generations for models of cars
api_list.description: Get generations with filter by make and model
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://api-for-copart-and-iaai.p.rapidapi.com/generations/94"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "api-for-copart-and-iaai.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
